org.apache.chemistry.opencmis.commons.server

Interface CallContext

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MutableCallContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CallContextWrapper, MutableCallContextWrapper

    public interface CallContext
    An object implementing this interface holds context data of the current call.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BINDING_ATOMPUB
      Binding: AtomPub
      static String BINDING_BROWSER
      Binding: Browser
      static String BINDING_LOCAL
      Binding: Local
      static String BINDING_WEBSERVICES
      Binding: Web Services
      static String CMIS_VERSION
      Key: CMIS version (value is a CmisVersion)
      static String ENCRYPT_TEMP_FILE
      Key: encrypt temp files (values is a Boolean)
      static String HTTP_SERVLET_REQUEST
      Key: servlet request (value is a HttpServletRequest)
      static String HTTP_SERVLET_RESPONSE
      Key: servlet response (value is a HttpServletResponse)
      static String LENGTH
      Key: length (value is a BigInteger)
      static String LOCALE
      Key: local
      static String LOCALE_ISO3166_COUNTRY 
      static String LOCALE_ISO639_LANGUAGE 
      static String MAX_CONTENT_SIZE
      Key: max content size (values is a Long)
      static String MEMORY_THRESHOLD
      Key: memory threshold (values is an Integer)
      static String OFFSET
      Key: offset (value is a BigInteger)
      static String PASSWORD
      Key: password
      static String REPOSITORY_ID
      Key: repository id
      static String SERVLET_CONTEXT
      Key: servlet context (value is a ServletContext)
      static String STREAM_FACTORY
      Key: factory for threshold streams (value is a TempStoreOutputStreamFactory)
      static String TEMP_DIR
      Key: temp directory
      static String USERNAME
      Key: username

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Returns the repository ID.

      Returns the user name.
      boolean isObjectInfoRequired()
      Returns if true object infos can improve the performance.

    • Method Detail

      • getBinding

        String getBinding()
        Returns the binding. Usually it returns BINDING_ATOMPUB, BINDING_WEBSERVICES, BINDING_BROWSER or BINDING_LOCAL.
        Returns:
        the binding

      • isObjectInfoRequired

        boolean isObjectInfoRequired()
        Returns if true object infos can improve the performance.
        Returns:
        if object infos are required

      • get

        Object get(String key)
        Returns context data by key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the data if the key is valid, null otherwise

      • getCmisVersion

        CmisVersion getCmisVersion()
        Returns the CMIS version.
        Returns:
        the CMIS version, not null

      • getRepositoryId

        String getRepositoryId()
        Returns the repository ID.
        Returns:
        the repository ID or null if it's a repository info call

      • getUsername

        String getUsername()
        Returns the user name.
        Returns:
        the user name if provided

      • getPassword

        String getPassword()
        Returns the password.
        Returns:
        the password if provided

      • getLocale

        String getLocale()
        Returns the locale.
        Returns:
        the locale if set

      • getOffset

        BigInteger getOffset()
        Returns the content offset.
        Returns:
        the content offset if set, null otherwise

      • getLength

        BigInteger getLength()
        Returns the content length.
        Returns:
        the content length if set, null otherwise

      • getTempDirectory

        File getTempDirectory()
        Returns the temp directory.
        Returns:
        the temp directory

      • encryptTempFiles

        boolean encryptTempFiles()
        Returns if temp files should be encrypted.
        Returns:
        true if temp files should be encrypted, false otherwise

      • getMemoryThreshold

        int getMemoryThreshold()
        Returns the memory threshold.
        Returns:
        the memory threshold in bytes

      • getMaxContentSize

        long getMaxContentSize()
        Returns the max size of content.
        Returns:
        the max content size in bytes
